data.eml:eml: Two new species of family Neotanaidae (Peracarida: Tanaidacea) from the Antarctic and Mid-Pacific Oceans

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Araújo-Silva, Catarina L., Froufe, Elsa, Larsen, Kim (2015): Two new species of family Neotanaidae (Peracarida: Tanaidacea) from the Antarctic and Mid-Pacific Oceans. Zootaxa 4018 (4): 535-552, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4018.4.3
